entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF generates additional mapping to the same sql column with '1' postfix in column name #29503
  • Potential breaking change with identity column in EF Core 7 when saving entity generated from projection #29502
  • EFCore 7 - SqlServer - ConcurrencyCheck attribute is not working for aggregate type for which ToJson() is defined #29501
  • EFCore 7 - SqlServer - How to use Aggregate types in where clause for which ToJson is defined #29500
  • Error when mapping a common abstracted relationship table to more than one case #29498
  • Cosmos: add support for ElementAt(OrDefault) #29497

Closed

  • Add a generic overload of ConventionSetBuilder.Remove #29476
    8.0.0
  • Creating a bundle fails due to missing 'libhostpolicy.dylib' library on M1 Mac and Windows #29495

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #29506

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29508
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29507
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #29505
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #29504
  • Add a generic overload of ConventionSetBuilder.Remove #29499

Updated

  • Fix to #17066 - Query: Translate ElementAt(OrDefault) #29496
  • Proposed fix for Optional RestartSequenceOperation.StartValue #26560 #29346
